languages.text: "Хочу предупредить вас, что в боях многие мятежники несли снаряжение блюстителей. Судя по всему, они сняли его с солдат, помогавших в спасательных работах, — предатели из Гильдии Инфернус перебили их в спину. Будьте осторожны".
languages.translation_comment: у врагов в боях бафф InfernusArmoured_buff
у врагов в боях бафф InfernusArmoured_buff

languages.text: "I should warn you that many of the rebels were carrying enforcers' equipment during the battle. Apparently, they took it from the soldiers assisting in the rescue efforts. Those traitors from the Infernus Guild stabbed them in the back. Be careful."
languages.original_text: "Хочу предупредить вас, что в боях многие мятежники несли снаряжение блюстителей. Судя по всему, они сняли его с солдат, помогавших в спасательных работах, — предатели из Гильдии Инфернус перебили их в спину. Будьте осторожны".

traits.locale_text: "I would like to warn you that many of the rebels were carrying enforcers' equipment during the battle. Apparently, they took it off the soldiers who were helping in the rescue efforts, the traitors from the Infernus Guild stabbed them in the back. Be careful."

"I would like to warn you that many of the rebels were carrying enforcers' equipment during the battle. Apparently, they took it off the soldiers who were helping in the rescue efforts, the traitors from the Infernus Guild stabbed them in the back. Be careful."

"I should warn you that many of the rebels were carrying enforcers' equipment during the battle. Apparently, they took it from the soldiers assisting in the rescue efforts. Those traitors from the Infernus Guild stabbed them in the back. Be careful."

"I should warn you that many of the rebels were carrying enforcers' equipment during the battle. Apparently, they took it from the soldiers assisting in the rescue efforts. Those traitors from the Infernus Guild stabbed them in the back. Be careful."

languages.text: «Debería advertirle de que muchos de los rebeldes llevaban equipo de nuestros guardias durante la batalla. Al parecer, se lo arrebataron a los soldados enviados a tareas de rescate. Los traidores del gremio de infernus les apuñalaron por la espalda. Tenga cuidado».
languages.original_text: "I should warn you that many of the rebels were carrying enforcers' equipment during the battle. Apparently, they took it from the soldiers assisting in the rescue efforts. Those traitors from the Infernus Guild stabbed them in the back. Be careful."

traits.locale_text: «Debería advertirle de que muchos de los rebeldes llevaban equipo de nuestros guardias durante la batalla. Al parecer, se lo arrebataron a los soldados enviados a tareas de rescate. Los traidores del gremio de infernus les apuñalaron por la espalda. Tenga cuidado».

languages.text: 「警告しておきます。戦闘中、反乱軍の多くはエンフォーサーの装備を持っていました。どうやら、救助活動を手伝っていた兵士たちから奪ったようです。インフェルヌス・ギルドの裏切り者たちが彼らを刺した。気をつけてください」
languages.original_text: "I should warn you that many of the rebels were carrying enforcers' equipment during the battle. Apparently, they took it from the soldiers assisting in the rescue efforts. Those traitors from the Infernus Guild stabbed them in the back. Be careful."

traits.locale_text: 「警告しておきます。戦闘中、反乱軍の多くはエンフォーサーの装備を持っていました。どうやら、救助活動を手伝っていた兵士たちから奪ったようです。インフェルヌス・ギルドの裏切り者たちが彼らを刺した。気をつけてください」

languages.text: “我得提醒您，许多叛军都携带着执法者的装备。很显然，那些装备都是从协助救援的士兵那里抢走的。控火行会的那些叛徒在背后捅了他们一刀，请您多加小心。”
languages.original_text: "I should warn you that many of the rebels were carrying enforcers' equipment during the battle. Apparently, they took it from the soldiers assisting in the rescue efforts. Those traitors from the Infernus Guild stabbed them in the back. Be careful."

traits.locale_text: “我得提醒您，许多叛军都携带着执法者的装备。很显然，那些装备都是从协助救援的士兵那里抢走的。控火行会的那些叛徒在背后捅了他们一刀，请您多加小心。”

languages.text: "Ich sollte Euch warnen, dass viele der Rebellen im Kampf mit Enforcer-Ausrüstung ausgestattet waren. Offenbar haben sie sie den Soldaten abgenommen, die bei den Rettungsmissionen geholfen haben. Diese Verräter von der Infernus-Gilde haben ihnen eine Klinge in den Rücken gerammt. Seid auf der Hut."
languages.original_text: "I should warn you that many of the rebels were carrying enforcers' equipment during the battle. Apparently, they took it from the soldiers assisting in the rescue efforts. Those traitors from the Infernus Guild stabbed them in the back. Be careful."

traits.locale_text: "Ich sollte Euch warnen, dass viele der Rebellen im Kampf mit Enforcer-Ausrüstung ausgestattet waren. Offenbar haben sie sie den Soldaten abgenommen, die bei den Rettungsmissionen geholfen haben. Diese Verräter von der Infernus-Gilde haben ihnen eine Klinge in den Rücken gerammt. Seid auf der Hut."

languages.text: « J'aimerais néanmoins vous avertir que de nombreux rebelles portaient de l'équipement normalement réservé aux prévôts. Ils les ont vraisemblablement pris aux soldats qui participaient aux opérations de sauvetage, que ces traîtres de la guilde infernus ont poignardés dans le dos. Soyez {mf|prudent|prudente}. »
languages.original_text: "I should warn you that many of the rebels were carrying enforcers' equipment during the battle. Apparently, they took it from the soldiers assisting in the rescue efforts. Those traitors from the Infernus Guild stabbed them in the back. Be careful."

traits.locale_text: « J'aimerais néanmoins vous avertir que de nombreux rebelles portaient de l'équipement normalement réservé aux prévôts. Ils les ont vraisemblablement pris aux soldats qui participaient aux opérations de sauvetage, que ces traîtres de la guilde infernus ont poignardés dans le dos. Soyez {mf|prudent|prudente}. »

languages.text: "Sizi ikaz etmeliyim. İsyancılardan birçoğu, infazcı ekipmanıyla çatışıyordu. Anladığımız kadarıyla kurtarma çalışmalarına katılan askerlerden almışlar. İtfa Locası'na mensup hainler, bizimkileri sırtından bıçaklamış. Dikkat edin."
languages.original_text: "I should warn you that many of the rebels were carrying enforcers' equipment during the battle. Apparently, they took it from the soldiers assisting in the rescue efforts. Those traitors from the Infernus Guild stabbed them in the back. Be careful."
